about.title: Tailored for in-person experiences
about.body: BrightShelf Boutique offers curated home goods and accessories. Use this template to highlight pricing, share your story, and invite shoppers to reach out by phone or visit your location.

items.quote: Our customers love browsing online before visiting in person!
items.author: Morgan, Owner

items.quote: The template makes sharing new arrivals simple and fast.

products.name: Hand-crafted Stoneware Mug
products.description: Heirloom-quality mug with a matte finish and ergonomic handle. Perfect for your morning coffee or evening tea. Each piece is unique.

products.name: Warm Cedar Candle
products.description: Slow-burning soy candle with notes of cedarwood, amber, and sage. 60-hour burn time. Hand-poured in small batches.

products.name: Linen Throw Blanket
products.description: Soft, breathable linen throw available in oat, slate, and moss. Perfect for any season. Size: 50x60 inches.

products.name: Ceramic Dinner Plate Set
products.description: Set of 4 hand-glazed dinner plates in a soft cream finish. Microwave and dishwasher safe. 11-inch diameter.

products.name: Organic Cotton Table Runner
products.description: Hand-woven table runner from 100% organic cotton. Available in natural, charcoal, and terracotta. 72 inches long.

products.name: Brass & Walnut Serving Board
products.description: Beautiful serving board combining American walnut with brass handles. Perfect for charcuterie. 18x12 inches.

products.name: Lavender & Honey Soap Bar
products.description: Handmade cold-process soap with organic lavender and local honey. Gentle on sensitive skin. 4 oz bar.

products.name: Woven Basket Set
products.description: Set of 3 handwoven seagrass baskets in graduated sizes. Perfect for storage or display. Fair trade certified.

products.name: Vintage-Style Enamel Pitcher
products.description: Classic white enamel pitcher with black rim. Perfect for flowers or serving beverages. Holds 2 quarts.
